name: Rossignol Race Skate IFP Bindings - Unisex
description: Performance bindings with auto step-in and a double lock slider. Compatible with the  IFP binding system that offers natural ski flex and unparalleled snow feel. The low-profile stack adds stability in the glide phase and adds precision as you push off.Flex index is designed for skate skiing to promote power transfer and ski control (11.0 flex index; 40° amplitude).Step-in design automatically clicks closed. Twist the ergonomic turn lock to open.Low profile stack height ensures maximum stability through the gliding phase and direct snow feel for increased precision.Compatible with IFP mounting plate only.Fits boots 35-52.
